Package atg.payment.avs

Interface Summary
AddressVerificationInfo This class defines a address verification information which is passed to the AddressVerificationProcessor.
AddressVerificationItem This class is an interface of AVS information.
AddressVerificationProcessor This class defines an interface for address verification processing.
AddressVerificationStatus This interface defines an address verification transaction status.
 

Class Summary
AddressVerificationStatusImpl This class defines address verification information which is generated by the AddressVerificationProcessor.
GenericAddressVerificationInfo This is an implementation of the AddressVerificationInfo interface.
